Evanesco Offline
  • API Reference
  • View page source

API ReferenceÔÉÅ

evanesco

Evanesco Offline

evanesco.core

Core pipeline orchestration for OCR, detection, LLM filtering, and redaction.

evanesco.ocr

OCR utilities.

evanesco.spacy_detect

spaCy-based named entity detection helpers.

evanesco.regex_detect

Deterministic regex-based PII detectors.

evanesco.align

Align character spans to OCR word boxes to produce redaction rectangles.

evanesco.redact

Redaction routines.

evanesco.ollama_client

Thin client for calling a local Ollama HTTP server.

evanesco.llm

Pluggable LLM client interface with retry/backoff.

evanesco.cli

Command-line interface for Evanesco Offline PII redaction.

evanesco.ui

Gradio UI for Evanesco Offline document anonymization.

evanesco.api

FastAPI service exposing Evanesco redaction as HTTP endpoints.

evanesco.batch

Simple batch runner with multiprocessing concurrency.

evanesco.policy

Redaction policy management.

evanesco.audit

Audit logging for Evanesco runs.

evanesco.logging

Structured logging helpers (JSON).
